sn11.4:1.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo asure amantesi:
sn11.4:1.4: ‘sace, marisa, devanam asurasangame samupabyulhe asura jineyyum deva parajineyyum, yena nam sakkam devanamindam kanthapancamehi bandhanehi bandhitva mama santike aneyyatha asurapuran’ti.
sn11.4:1.5: Sakkopi kho, bhikkhave, devanamindo deve tavatimse amantesi:
sn11.4:1.6: ‘sace, marisa, devanam asurasangame samupabyulhe deva jineyyum asura parajineyyum, yena nam vepacittim asurindam kanthapancamehi bandhanehi bandhitva mama santike aneyyatha sudhammasabhan’ti.
sn11.4:1.7: Tasmim kho pana, bhikkhave, sangame deva jinimsu, asura parajinimsu.
sn11.4:1.8: Atha kho, bhikkhave, deva tavatimsa vepacittim asurindam kanthapancamehi bandhanehi bandhitva sakkassa devanamindassa santike anesum sudhammasabham.
sn11.4:1.9: Tatra sudam, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo kanthapancamehi bandhanehi baddho sakkam devanamindam sudhammasabham pavisantanca nikkhamantanca asabbhahi pharusahi vacahi akkosati paribhasati.
sn11.4:1.10: Atha kho, bhikkhave, matali sangahako sakkam devanamindam gathahi ajjhabhasi:
sn11.4:13.1: So hi nama, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo sakam punnaphalam upajivamano devanam tavatimsanam issariyadhipaccam rajjam karento khantisoraccassa vannavadi bhavissati.
sn11.4:13.2: Idha kho tam, bhikkhave, sobhetha yam tumhe evam svakkhate dhammavinaye pabbajita samana khama ca bhaveyyatha sorata ca”ti.
